pages.title: Ender Dragon
pages.text: Level: <level_t1>$(br2)To enter the End, you need to collect $(bold)12$() $(key)special eyes$(), which come from boss loot.$(br2)After defeating $(boss/t1/day_night)Day Stalker & Night Prowler$(), craft and use $(key)Celestial Luminary$() to unlock the $(key)End Stage$() and grant yourself the $(bold)authority$() to enter the End.

pages.title: Dragon Egg & Scales
pages.text: $(key)Ender Dragon$() always has the $(key)Black Hole$() trait. When its fireballs explode, $(key)Black Hole$() appears â€” be careful and dodge.$(br2)Defeating $(key)Ender Dragon$() drops a $(key)Dragon Egg$() (used to summon $(boss/t1/the_eye)The Eye$()), and also drops $(key)Dragon Scales$() which can be used to craft the $(mechanic/loot_charm)Miraculous Looting Charm$().
